abstract: Woot, an online shopping site, wasn’t content with just putting out a press release to trumpet its sale to Amazon.com. So it put out a rap video on YouTube hosted by a stuffed monkey.
snippet: Woot, an online shopping site, wasn’t content with just putting out a press release to trumpet its sale to Amazon.com. So it put out a rap video on YouTube hosted by a stuffed monkey.
lead_paragraph: Upon agreeing to sell themselves, most companies are content to keep their public statements to a simple press release and maybe a conference call.

headline.main: ‘We Got Acquired by Amazon': Woot’s Deal Video
